query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid='@s1@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.mainExecuteEndDate<est.operatetime and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.mainExecuteEndDate<est.operatetime and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid='@s1@'

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_netdata est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=114 and est1.mainExecuteEndDate<est1.operatetime and est1.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est1.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est1.operatedeptid='@s1@' ) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid='@s1@'

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid in (@revRoleid@) and est.operateroleid is not null and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid='@s1@' and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.mainExecuteEndDate<est.operatetime and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid in (@revRoleid@) and est.operateroleid is not null and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.mainExecuteEndDate<est.operatetime and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid='@s1@' and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_netdata est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=114 and est1.mainExecuteEndDate<est1.operatetime and est1.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est1.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est1.operateroleid='@s1@' and LENGTH(est1.operateroleid)=32 ) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid='@s1@'

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateuserid in (@revUserid@) and est.operateuserid is not null

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_netdata est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=114 and est1.mainExecuteEndDate<est1.operatetime and est1.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est1.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est1.operateuserid='@s1@' ) and est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateuserid='@s1@'
